nodes.text: Jeren Nolus Organa was a male Human member of House Organa during the Alderaan Civil War and a seventh cousin of duke Charle Remmot Organa. A strong supporter of Jace Malcom, Organa was extremely loyal to him out of respect for Malcolm's sacrifices for the planet during the Great Galactic War. During the Alderaan Civil War, Jeren led a small camp of soldiers stationed in the King's Pass. After the camp was attacked and many, including Jeren, received injuries, he received medical supplies delivered by a Republic citizen.
